SharpKit v4.03.0000

  * Fixed upgrade issue in installation.
  * Added SharpKit SDK assemblies into installer.
  * JsTypeAttribute can be applied on external types, as an assembly attribute, using the TargetType property.
  * JsTypeAttribute supports adding manual js code before and after the type export, using the PreCode and PostCode properties.
  * JsTypeAttribute now supports custom order of types in a single file, using the OrderInFile property.
